captain_america.title: Captain America: Brave New World
captain_america.description: Sam Wilson officially takes up the mantle of Captain America and finds himself in the middle of an international incident involving a mysterious island.

thunderbolts.title: Thunderbolts
thunderbolts.description: A group of supervillains are recruited by the government to go on dangerous black ops missions in exchange for clemency.

mission_impossible.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
mission_impossible.description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet in what could be their final adventure.

superman.title: Superman
superman.description: Clark Kent embraces his Kryptonian heritage and becomes Superman, Earth's greatest protector and symbol of hope.

fantastic_four.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
fantastic_four.description: Marvel's First Family embark on a retro-futuristic adventure as they face their greatest challenge yet and discover what it truly means to be a family.
